title: Apple Music launches new DJ mixes with Spatial Audio
content:
Apple Music today launched a new set of DJ mixes recorded in Dolby Atmos, enabling Apple Music subscribers to listen to the mixes in Spatial Audio. You can listen to the first one here. New Spatial Audio mixes will be rolling out every month.

more…

The post Apple Music launches new DJ mixes with Spatial Audio appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple Music today launched a new set of DJ mixes recorded in Dolby Atmos, enabling Apple Music subscribers to listen to the mixes in Spatial Audio. You can listen to the first one here. New Spatial Audio mixes will be rolling out every month. Alongside the launch, Apple is relaunching the ‘One Mix’ series which […]
